tool_description: With the Date to Text API you can convert a date to a textual representation. It is also possible to get a human readable format of the difference between a given date and the current time.
title: Date to Text

api_list.name: Date Difference
api_list.description: Get a human readable, textual representation of the difference between now and a given date.

api_list.name: Date To Text
api_list.description: Get the textual representation of a given date
